DOC.brief_summary: In patients who are receiving nilotinib, nilotinib plasma levels will be measured after 1 month of nilotinib treatment. The relationship between surgery type and nilotinib pharmakokinetic properties will be investigated in this study.
DOC.brief_title: Nilotinib Pharmacokinetics (PK) in Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumor (GIST)
DOC.criteria: Patients with metastatic or unresectable gastrointestinal stromal tumor Patients receiving nilotinib after failure to imatinib and sunitinib
